UBC Map Set Viewer / OpenIndexMap-o-Matic

This project is a minimalistic way to view a collection of OpenIndexMap geoJSON. It is built on top of Jekyllâ€™s Minima theme and uses custom map layouts built especially for OpenIndexMaps.

Brought to you by UBC Library Research Commons Made with the OpenIndexMap-O-Matic
